Exhausted from compiling entry #3. Posting it tomorrow.
Entry #3: http://bit.ly/cIZWi
Feeling very disorganized.
I have to stop watching these tapes for today. Thinking I'll go outside.
Nothing new to report today. Went through a good number of tapes, but they revealed nothing.
Found something. Will post it tomorrow. For now I need some sleep.

Nothing today. I'll keep looking.
Found something new. Will be posting it later today.

Feeling better now. Back to the tapes.

chapters.content: yes\\\

Moving soon. Need to take my mind off the tapes for a day or two.
Will be without internet access until the 10th once I'm completely moved in. If I see anything new, I will find a way to upload it.

Headache. Need to lay down for a while.
Blacked out last night. Going to the doctor tomorrow.

chapters.title: Entry #13
chapters.content: I was close by.
Entry #13: http://bit.ly/pOM71

chapters.title: Exit
chapters.content: remember me.
very unnerved by totheark's response: http://bit.ly/lr9Sh
It was ~3 years ago, so my memory of entry 13 is a little fuzzy. Though I do remember going to get a battery out of Alex's car.
Definitely never noticed anyone filming me do so.
Could not sleep at all last night. Shaking. Thinking of going back to the doctor again.
Getting back to the tapes.
Entry 14 found. Will post it by the end of the day.
Entry 14 found. Will post it by the end of the day.

chapters.title: Entry #17

Going to try and get some sleep now. But I doubt that will happen after all I've seen today.

chapters.title: Signal
chapters.content: again.
totheark responds: http://bit.ly/s5VYt
Starting to reconsider going back to that house.
The general consensus is that I should go back to the house. So I'm trying to work out a day to go. Another doctor appointment soon.
Going back to the house tomorrow.
Just got back. Going to try and get some sleep then I'll put the video on youtube.
Next entry will be up in about 30 minutes.
Entry #18: http://bit.ly/1gDrnh
totheark usually responds by now.
This past week has been bad.
I have Entry #19. It should be on youtube tomorrow unless something happens. Which it could. I don't really know anymore.
Entry #19: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-qZUgxShlM
Still holed up here.
Also, for some reason I keep getting asked my real name. It's Jay. You've all been right from the beginning.
totheark responds: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sUI-3lU6bek
It's getting so much more difficult to take all this in. Feel like I'm being driven insane.
The response has to be during entry 19. I wasn't wearing those clothes the last time I was at the house: http://bit.ly/3r9CBy
No, that was the first time I was at the house when totheark made that response. All of my memories are getting completely mixed up now.
Still haven't left the house. Running out of tapes to look through.
Found something. So tired though.
Entry #19.5 will be posted sometime today.

chapters.title: Entry #19.5
chapters.content: Trying to make connections.
A lot of people are thinking "the tower" could be the red tower both Alex and I saw during Entry #5. That's the most solid lead so far.
I think I remember where the tower is located. Going to try and find it on a satellite map soon.
http://twitpic.com/t05zw - Found it.
I've decided to go to that red tower. In the daytime, of course. Not sure when, though. I'm running out of food here.
Found what may be the last of the clips from the tapes. Will post Entry #20 later today.
Entry #20: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1VKridtP5FQ
It's very difficult to tell who's operating the camera in #20. Alex would probably make do with whoever he had, so it could be anyone.

chapters.title: Version
chapters.content: s.
Most have probably already noticed, but totheark responds: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1VKridtP5FQ
Going to the red tower asap.
Caused some confusion with the last update. Not going to the red tower NOW. Probably in a couple of days.
Going to the red tower tomorrow.
Leaving now.
http://twitpic.com/uj79u -
http://twitpic.com/ujbyj - Kind of strange seeing other people.
http://twitpic.com/ujga9 - Almost there.
http://twitpic.com/ujhzk - Road to the trail is fenced off. Guess I'm walking.
Cell phone signal is coming and going. Still walking on the road to the trail.
At the beginning of the trail. Getting my camera ready.
http://twitpic.com/ujmmz -
Cell phone camera is getting interference. Video camera is alright for now.
Phone signal almost gone. Have to cross a small creek and I'm at the tower. Filming when I get across.
http://twitpic.com/ujrii -
jBdzj!zö&&+555n?21
Walking back to my car. Getting dark fast.
Have a good signal again. Almost back to my car I think.
Back to the car. Couldn't remember the way back for a moment.
Will be posting Entry #21 tonight.
Uploading video now.

chapters.title: Entry #21
chapters.content: 1 of 2.

Just noticed the "jBdzj!zö&&+555n?21" update. It originally said "found something". No idea what happened to it.
The footage on this tape is too much for me right now. I have to go to bed.
I'll be posting the tape, in its entirety, later tonight.
Don't want to upload the footage. But it needs to be somewhere in case something happens to the tape. Or me.
Entry #22: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Y7_WP9HOME
Quick reminder to please refrain from contacting me via AIM. It's too hectic. Trying to keep everyone as updated as I can with twitter.
Still waiting to see if totheark does anything.
Not sure why totheark has been so quiet. I may be on my own for a while.
Beginning to think the only choice I have is going back to the house.
totheark responds: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6PdSebzNinc

Have been trying to sleep for a while. No luck.
totheark responds twice: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rIe-a6-TNHI
Returning to the house yet again seems to be the only option. Going in the daytime no matter what.
Going back this week.
Beginning to lose track of days now. Decided to return to the house Wednesday.
How did I get here
Trying to get the footage off the camera. Entry #23 later tonight I hope. Head feels liquefied.
Entry #23 will be uploaded in about 20 minutes.
Fixed the problem. 17 minutes to go.
Entry #23: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SzdZyZgCY58
I have felt completely functionless since quitting.

chapters.title: Warning
chapters.content: failure nigh.
I know that totheark responded. I just don't want to acknowledge it anymore.
Considering boarding up my windows. Still feeling incredibly unsafe here.
Looking through some surveillance footage. Not sure what I'll find. I feel like I just have know one more time what's been going on.
Typo earlier. Still looking through the footage.
Entry #24 will be posted later tonight.
Entry #24: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B_rA7gQl95w
Feeling like I'm being watched constantly
Checked the latest surveillance footage again last night. Nothing unusual. Maybe Entry #24 was a camera glitch?
I did not post Entry ######. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N7QXQZjp5XM
Not sure what to think about it. Definitely considering getting out of here though.
Not sure what to think about it. Definitely considering getting out of here though.
Left town after the last tweet. Staying at a hotel now.
Something brought to my attention. Entry #25 later tonight.

chapters.content: Names and locations have been removed.

http://twitpic.com/1dbey4 - Received this text message from an unknown number.
If that text message I received a couple of weeks ago was a date, it's today. Changed my location since then.
Feeling more paranoid. The maid knocked on my door earlier and I almost had a heart attack.
I think I'm going to leave again soon, just to be safe.
About to leave.
Entry #26 will be posted later tonight.

chapters.title: Entry #28
chapters.content: Searching for anything.
I've searched everywhere in the hotel room. The safe is the only lead I have right now. Need to figure out this code.
Been so tired lately. I've slept for over 12 hours straight these past few days.
Stayed up all night looking at this footage. Going to sleep a while now. Entry #29 will be posted tonight.
Back up. Uploading 29 soon.

Entry #30 will be uploaded soon.

Lonely holiday, but not as bad as last year. At least I didn't have to climb a rotting tower this time.
Looking for Entry #29's location this week. Who knows if it's even around here though.
I've been searching on and off all week. Entry #31 tomorrow.
Entry #31 will be uploaded in about 30 minutes.

Looking through the tapes. I'm hoping I'll have something by tomorrow.
This feels all too familiar.
The majority of the first bits of footage have just been me driving.

Found something promising. Entry #34 should be uploaded in about an hour.

chapters.title: Entry #34

chapters.title: Fragments
chapters.content: hello again.
Just brought to my attention: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SUeFeJtqn28

I was not expecting what I just found on these tapes. Can't decide if I should upload it or not.
Going to try and sleep. If I decide to upload this stuff, it'll be tomorrow.
I've decided to post it. Entry #35 should be uploaded in about 30 minutes.
Youtube is in maintenance mode right now. It will probably be a little longer than I thought to upload.
Still in maintenance mode. Nothing I can do.

chapters.title: Broadcast
chapters.content: are you drowning.
Thanks to everyone who let me know about the ToTheArk response: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_myhIXgVF-o
I definitely hear words on this video. Can't make out anything coherent right now, though.
I think the tape from entry #35 was damaged when the camera was dropped. Spending tonight trying to fix it. More footage could be on it.
Nothing was wrong with the tape itself, but I did find some corrupt footage on the end of it. Posting it as Entry #36 later today.
Entry #36: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O6p-8Lu-Hm8
Just now saw the ToTheArk response. Guess whoever it is knows Alex's phone number. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HOou1wxXu4o
@Theyeballkid I didn't see the numbers in the end until now. Thanks for saving me some time.
The last few tapes have just been of me driving around by myself. Where did Alex go?
Found something that makes me not want to go through the rest of these tapes. Headache. Laying down for now. Uploading it tomorrow.
Trying to upload entry #37, but I can't sign in to youtube.
People that follow me: Is youtube letting you sign in?
Judging by the response, I'm the only one having this problem...
I may have temporarily forgotten my password.
I keep trying different ones but nothing's working.
Come on!  http://twitpic.com/4c08b0
I've tried all the passwords I've ever used. None are working.
Why can't I remember!
I can't use the forgotten password feature because it's linked to aan old email address that I also don't remember the password of.
I have the worst hheadache right now..
Keep thnking I'm hearing things.
.hea'ds poudning.
sllee pno.w

chapters.title: enttry #37
chapters.content: memories.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hE8aZZx1dTI
Just woke up in my car, near the red tower. Don't remember how I got here. This is a long way from where I was.
The tapes aren't with me, and the footage I copied to my laptop has apparently been deleted. I need to get back. Fast.
On my way back. I looked in the red tower again before leaving, but didn't find anything.
@brasilkid16 I was at a rest area charging my laptop. How is that bad planning?

chapters.title: Entry #38
chapters.content: Unlabeled.

Uploading Entry #39 soon.

chapters.content: c2VlIHlvdSBzYXcgeW91.

40 is uploading to youtube. I really don't want to watch it again.

chapters.title: Intermission
chapters.content: YmV oaW5kIHRo ZSBjd XJ0YWlu.

@BranRainey Maybe. Who knows where she is now, though.
Like clockwork, ToTheArk responded last week. http://youtu.be/lQ-JriTEqn8
Finished the Entry 40 tape. Something there that I don't like. Entry 41 will be uploaded soon.
Weird. Problem with the video I've never had before. Should be uploaded in about an hour or so.
Entry #41: http://youtu.be/e-d5ibaU4PM
No clue who that could have been in Entry #41. Why wasn't my car door locked?
No clue who that could have been in Entry #41. Why wasn't my car door locked?
I doubt it was Tim in #41. It was only a week after Alex incapacitated him. No way he'd be walking by then.
@adf___ The ones I found in the hotel safe are numbered (although a handful aren't). I also told Alex "It's been over a week" in Entry #39.

chapters.title: Indicator
chapters.content: blind.
ToTheArk's latest response: http://youtu.be/oCeBFW0KYV0
@LeahsGotIt That's possible, but I have a remote for it. It's not like I'd have to fumble with keys if I had to unlock the door in a hurry.
@raiiban I'm okay for the time being. I don't want to advertise my location too much.
I had forgotten about the external hard drive I found in the hotel safe, I should be looking through it at the same time as these tapes.
Entry #42: http://t.co/Rba7DPz
Can't believe this whole thing started two years ago. I never should have taken those original tapes from Alex.

chapters.title: Memories
chapters.content: NT Qz MjE =
ToTheArk has responded. Thanks again for letting me know when it updates. http://t.co/Y6SSGYm
Trying to keep the footage from the tapes and the footage from the hard drive straight is getting confusing.
Things are looking very bad. Entry #43 will be uploaded in about an hour.
Entry #43: http://t.co/tbtYChF

chapters.title: Inquiry
chapters.content: maɪnəs sɛntrɔɪd.
ToTheArk response: http://t.co/xoaQfiU
Those videos are so inconsistent. It's like they're being made by different people. No way I can prove that, though.
@SPLATspazz It's what I'm trying to figure out. The closer I feel I get, the more I feel I don't want to know.
@pivotshabz Did this come from ToTheArk?
@pivotshabz Thanks for this. Not sure it's something I wanted to see, though...
@BranRainey There was no music playing at the time. I think you might be hearing the hum of the AC?
Continuing to look through the external hard drive. At least I'm not having to fumble with tapes very much right now.
@BranRainey Coming from the TV. I probably had it on for background noise. Otherwise the silence would make me think I was hearing things.
Stayed up all night looking through the external hard drive. Entry #44 will be posted tonight after I try to sleep.
Entry #44: http://t.co/Tf1Dkqk
@LadySuccubusGod Looks like his eyes are open to me.
I don't know why I'm surprised to find footage from different cameras on the external hard drive. Makes sense Alex may have more than one.
Think I found something. If it's what I think it is, Entry 45 will be posted tonight.
@Nick22490 Not yet, no. Don't know what to make of that.
Entry #45: http://t.co/6CLuKwN
It's getting even harder to keep the footage from Alex and the footage from me straight.
Finding a lot of footage of me tailing Alex without him knowing it.
@ItsMogkiKupo Who knows. I guess I'll find out soon enough.
Entry #46 will be posted later tonight.
Entry #46: http://t.co/oD7hKmI
By my reasoning, after Alex grabbed the tape from me, I took the key as I ran out just to have SOMETHING. Not 100% sure, of course.
Entry #47: http://t.co/fz7F7kF
Having trouble sleeping again. More so than usual, I mean.
There's a LOT of footage of me just tailing Alex. So far, it looks like he didn't notice me.
@TjArvidsson Nothing out of the ordinary, from what I can tell. Kind of frustrating to watch.
I've put a few things together. Entry #48 will be uploaded before I try and get some sleep tonight.
The upload to youtube is going strangely slow. Probably about 30 minutes to go.
Entry #48: http://t.co/1IWmInt
Starting to look through Alex's footage from when I was following him.
I'm pretty sure it's a camera bag that Alex was carrying around, but that doesn't guarantee there's a camera in it.
@thor9356 I've tried many, many times. No answer.

chapters.title: Sidenote
chapters.content: remainseated iwillfindyou.
ToTheArk responds. It's never been this fast before, as far as I remember. http://t.co/osFA30I
Finished looking through Alex's footage in the park. I don't want to share what I've seen.
Been thinking about it, and it might be best if I upload what happened in the park. Just in case anything happens to me one day.
But right now I'm feeling really exhausted. Entry #49 will be uploaded tomorrow.
Entry #49 will be uploaded in about 30 minutes.
Entry #49: http://t.co/HBcOOX6
Looking for any reports of a missing person around the area and time Entry #49 took place.
So far, I've found absolutely nothing about a missing person. I feel like I've looked everywhere, too.
@punxtr It's possible, but he doesn't really look homeless to me.
STILL nothing on a missing person. I can't figure it out.
Giving up on finding missing person reports. Getting back to the tapes.
@MrSkolVikes28 That's what I'm hoping to find soon. There's not that many tapes left.
@GreyouTT Then wouldn't there be a news story about it somewhere at least? I can't find anything.
@GreyouTT Yes, I've checked everything. Found nothing.

chapters.title: Extraction
chapters.content: never.
Think I may have found what came before the unlabeled footage in Entry #38.
There's a lot here to get through. Entry #50 will be posted tomorrow.
Also just now saw ToTheArk's response: http://t.co/IPe8nYLN Looks like the guy Alex attacked around the :22 mark...
Entry #50 is having some rendering problems. It will be uploaded in about an hour and a half, I think.
Entry #50: http://t.co/oD5li5do
Really paranoid. Had to change my location after I woke up with my hotel room door standing wide open. Nothing seems to be missing, though.
Finally have a chance to look through the mass of tapes for the 56-42 label.
Found it.
Entry #51 will be posted tonight, but I'm not sure how soon.
Video problems again. Great. I'm going to hold off on uploading Entry 51 until tomorrow. Too tired to keep waiting.
Entry #51: http://t.co/HwcCYNbl
Almost to the last tape. Been moving around so much lately.
On the last tape now.
Making a trip to somewhere I never thought I'd go back to.
Still driving. I'm going to try and have Entry #52 uploaded tomorrow night.
Finally here. I'm going to have a look around while it's still light out.
Entry #52 should be uploaded in about an hour.
Got delayed. Gonna give it another hour.
Having serious computer issues. Uploading will have to wait until tomorrow. Too tired to keep trying.
Entry #52: http://t.co/oai2jNnj
Typo in entry #52. I'll reupload it tomorrow fixed.

chapters.title: Entry #52
chapters.content: The last tape.
Entry #52 has been reuploaded with the typo fixed: http://t.co/GuTKRFjW
No sign of Tim as of right now. Still in the downtown area.
I've been sleeping much too well recently. It's an odd change of pace.
@BraveDave88 I'm not going to say anything for sure.
Getting back out there today. Maybe I'll ask some people around downtown if they've seen anyone that looks like Tim.
No luck today. Maybe there will be more people there tomorrow.
No luck again. Maybe Tim isn't a regular around here and it was just a lucky coincidence that I saw him when I did?
Going to look outside of the downtown area soon. There is still Rosswood park, but I'm not going there alone.
@SwagBruceington That's the problem. I don't trust anyone.
Drove by Rosswood Park today. Almost stopped, but then I realized that's a terrible idea. Why did I even consider it?
Couldn't sleep last night. First time that's happened in a while.
@msmarvelli Don't think so. Can't really remember though.
Didn't sleep for the entire weekend. Feeling dead.
@poristhead Whenever something happens worth putting on the channel.
@rulerofeden Not yet, I've asked a few random people around town but came up with nothing.
There has to be somewhere around here that Tim would frequent.
This place is the epitome of a small town. Almost everything is closed on Sundays.
Back in the downtown area. The store that Tim walked out of when I saw him is always closed when I'm here. No hours posted either.
Store's still closed. I looked through the window, and it seemed like an antique store of some kind?
Accidentally slept late today. I think I'm going to try and go back to that store really early soon and just wait for someone to show up.
Showed up early this morning at the store to see if anyone ever came. Nothing as of yet. Lights were on inside, though. http://t.co/EmbG787L
Showed up early this morning at the store to see if anyone ever came. Nothing as of yet. Lights were on inside, though. http://t.co/EmbG787L
Outside the store again. Trying to look inconspicuous on the bench across the street. Not sure if I'm succeeding at that or not.
A truck just pulled up behind the building. No one's gotten out of it for a few minutes.
Some guy just got out of the truck and went in through the back of the store. Gonna go try and talk to him when he comes out.
Just asked him when the store will be open. He said it's in the process of closing down for good.
I also asked if it would ever be open again. He said it will, since they're trying to sell off their current inventory.
He just left. He had loaded up a few large boxes in the back of his truck. I guess he was some kind of delivery driver?
.@ZamAfRocs He unlocked the back door himself, so he's probably an employee.
@SOREN2011 No, I did not.
The guy in the truck showed up again outside the store a few minutes ago.
Going to go around to the back and ask him if he's seen Tim around, whenever he comes back out.
He hasn't seen Tim. Told me he's the delivery driver for the store, so he's rarely sitting behind the counter inside.
He just left. I didn't see him lock the back door though.
I don't see anyone else in there right now so I'm going inside. http://t.co/Duo28khF
Looking around. http://t.co/OUjO3HZj
Lots of paintings of wooded areas in here. http://t.co/5DNlkzdD
Found a pile of old cameras in one of the display cases. http://t.co/EokeRNam
One of the other display cases is full of dolls. http://t.co/S6vBdcQ5
@MrSkolVikes28 All the display cases are locked.
One of the rooms is nearly empty. Only a few paintings left. Maybe it's the room that guy was taking stuff out of?
One of the few left. http://t.co/4tND9dsu
And this one. Looks similar to the other. http://t.co/0isqQ0Ik
The person in the center has a weird face. It's just two circles and a nose. But the rest of the picture is so detailed.
Just heard the truck pull up behind the store. Hiding.
He's talking on his phone with someone. Said he's done with all the deliveries except for one.
He's wandering around the store looking for something, I think. I really hope it's not in this room.
He just went upstairs. Sounds like he's dragging something heavy across the floor. I'm taking a chance and getting out of here.
Made it back outside. I'm leaving before the guy comes back out and recognizes me.
Drove by the store today. They had hung up a "going out of business sale" sign, still closed though. Surely they'll be open this week?
About to head over to the store. Hopefully someone there can tell me about Tim.
There's a ton of people in here. Must be a hell of a sale.
None of these people are Tim, though.
There's no one up at the counter, either.
Think I found the owner, but she's busy.
Just asked her if she's seen Tim but she said she didn't know who I was talking about. Don't think she really heard me.
Lost her again. I'm just going to come back tomorrow when the sale is over.
The empty room I was in last time is just full of books now. Didn't see that weird painting anywhere either. http://t.co/85gHGXG3
Back at the store. A lot less people here this time.
Different person working here this time. Hoping they've seen Tim.
She remembered Tim. Told me he mentioned going to a doctor's office.
Found what I think is a mental health clinic a few blocks down from the store. It's closed right now though.
It has the hours posted, at least.
Can't just walk into the clinic and ask about Tim. Not sure how to approach this.
@nickwilliams666 They probably wouldn't buy that, with doctor patient confidentiality and all.
Just got back from waiting outside the clinic again. Still no sign of Tim.
Now that I think about it, I'm not sure what I'm going to say to Tim if he shows up here. I have no idea how he'll react to seeing me.
Had my camera with me all week. Entry #53 will be uploaded tomorrow.

chapters.content: ey ess ee.

Entry #65: http://t.co/0sTMrW5i
Tim has been working constantly ever since Entry #65. Told me it's to get some money saved up. I think he's considering quitting his job.
@SDK_Films No, not at all.
@veroreos He's been working at the same place since I found him, I believe.
Dozed off earlier and had a really horrible nightmare. I can't remember what happened in it. At all. Can't sleep now.
New ToTheArk video. http://t.co/PFT0EtUM
Was just linked this. Looks like that shot of Jessica in the latest ToTheArk was taken from previous footage of mine. http://t.co/w3bW1oEp
Whoever ToTheArk is, they don't have original footage of Jessica. Not that they've shown so far. Maybe they don't know where she is either?
Still can't figure out the numbers at the end of the latest ToTheArk video. It's driving me crazy.
Still working on it. There's an even amount of numbers in each set, and a few number pairs repeat. Maybe a pair corresponds to a letter?
If a pair equals one letter, there's 26 letters in total. But there's only 9 unique numbers. Could each number have multiple letters?
Seems unlikely that all 26 letters of the alphabet are used, too. Just need to figure out which ones could be missing...
Two of the pairs are mirrors and are grouped together twice. 27-72 and 57-75. Not sure what that could mean yet though. Common letters?
Just noticed a few of these numbers have a pattern. First digit plus two. 13, 24, 57, 68, 79 all follow it.
Maybe 75 and 72 don't follow the pattern. They're just a mirrored version of the ones that do?
Sorry, only meant 57 with the previous tweet. 72 doesn't follow that pattern, even when reversed.
I'm getting confused. Taking a break from this for a few hours. Tim let me know he's working on it too so hopefully he'll get something.
It should go without saying that I'm not the one that did the last tweet.
If that new string of numbers follows the same rules as the others, it adds a few new pairs to work with.
13, 24, 35, 57, 68, 79 all follow the pattern I noticed earlier. 03 doesn't. Could there be a point where the first number starts from zero?
A couple of number pairs follow another pattern, I think. The second number increases by two. 83-95 and 27-39.
Still no progress on this code. Tim suggested that there might be an order the numbers are supposed to go in before it can be deciphered.
Adding in an unused number (46), I've found what might be a complete pattern: 13, 24, 35, 46, 57, 68, and 79.
83 could come after 79, too. The pattern started off with 3 as the second digit. 95 might come after that too.
Judging by the 83-95 and 27-39 pattern, what comes after 03 could be 15. Second number plus two.
All that being said, the full order I've figured out is 13, 24, 35, 46, 57, 68, 79, 83, 95, 03, 15, 27, 39.
So that's 13 number pairs, with the reversed ones left over. 26 letters in the alphabet. Each number must have two letters for it.
The reversed numbers only have one letter for them, along with the number they're reversing.
So finally, that translates to "truly your fault" and "she's out there" for the ToTheArk video. And "I am watching" for the tweet.
Who is "she", exactly? Jessica? Does ToTheArk know where she is?
Tim is finally finished working. We're going to the abandoned hospital sometime this weekend.
It ended up storming for a few days straight when we were going to the hospital. Tim had a doctor appointment today so we're going tomorrow.
